title: Riot messed up, bad
body: they messed up April fools harder than finebrothers messed up their YouTube channel with React World

replies.body:
Honestly, I think they played it brilliantly. It's not Riot's fault people were expecting URF to happen, that's just an assumption people have been making (and fairly unfounded too). So what it happened the last two years? Doesn't make Riot obliged to do it again this year.

And let's face it, it's a pretty good April Fools. I mean, lead everyone to think that it's going to happen, tell them it's not but, *plot twist*, you were telling the truth that it's not happening. Not to mention, now we get to see if all those idiots that said they'd leave if URF didn't come out actually leave or if they were just talking big.
I would happily wait for rotational queue, if this and the next weekend weren't the last weekends I'll be free on until the end of the year
